EmailTemplate.name: DPS - DuPont™ Tychem®, Tyvek® & ProShield®
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Tychem®, Tyvek® & ProShield®
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in DuPont™ Tychem®, Tyvek® & ProShield®.
Please visit our DuPont™ website on Tychem®, Tyvek® & ProShield® to obtain literature, find garments with confidence using SafeSPEC™ 2.0 and identify where to buy products. (To view the web address, cut and paste the web address below into your browser.)
http://www2.dupont.com/Personal_Protection/en_US/tech_info/literature_tychem.html
DuPont Protection Solutions
